application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Mixed Species Shrubs - (applicants ref. G1) - Trim back shrubs from main lawn. Reduce heights and thin density as is practicable. General maintenance.1 x Persian Ironwood (applicants ref. T2) - Approximately 7.00m:Reduce crown by approximately 1.20m-1.50m reducing over extended branches back into main crown structure to produce a more compact crown. Remove ivy from the crown thin crown density by approximately 20%. Remove dead wood throughout. Raise crown by 1.20m. General maintenance.1 x Beech (applicants ref. T3) - Approximately 8.00m: Reduce crown height by approximately 2.00m. Reduce lateral and sub lateral growth by 1.20m-1.50m. Remove ivy from crown. Thin crown density by approximately 20%. Remove dead wood. General maintenance.1 x Prunus Sapling (applicants ref. T4) - Approximately 4.00m: Fell to ground level. Prunus sapling growing up against the right hand hedge. should be removed before it gets too large. Not suitable for its location.1 x Young Apple (applicants ref. T5) Approximately 4.00m: Reduce crown by approximately 1.00m. Thin crown density by 20%. General maintenance.
